main: ^The Black Nazarene is a life- sized dark wooden sculpture of Jesus Christ dressed in a maroon tunic and carrying a wooden cross on one shoulder.

c-0: ^The Black Nazarene festival is considered the largest religious festival in Asia and celebrated annually on January 9. It is celebrated through Traslación which means transfer. The event is attended by millions of devotees and they wear maroon and yellow colored shirts while waving white towels in the air while walking.
^The image of the Black Nazarene was brought by the Spaniards and place in the altar of the Quiapo Church in Manila.
^It is a reenactment of the transfer of the Black Nazarene’s replica image from Intramuros to Quiapo Church.
